scripts.postinstall: npm run bootstrap && npm run reformat && npm run check:peer-deps && npm run check:typescript-project-references
scripts.reinstall: git checkout -- package-lock.json && npm run clean && npm install
scripts.test:unit-and-system-tests: lerna exec --ignore system-tests --concurrency 1 --stream --bail=false -- npm run test:unit --if-present && npm run coverage:system-tests
scripts.test:integration-tests-without-system-te: node scripts/download-vscode && lerna exec --ignore system-tests --concurrency 1 --stream --bail=false -- npm run test:integration --if-present && npm run test:vscode-integration --if-present
scripts.test:vscode-integration: node scripts/download-vscode && lerna exec --concurrency 1 --stream --bail=false -- npm run test:vscode-integration --if-present
scripts.test:without-system-tests: lerna exec --ignore system-tests --concurrency 1 --stream --bail=false -- npm run test --if-present
scripts.coverage:system-tests: lerna exec --scope system-tests --concurrency 1 --stream --bail=false -- npm run coverage:system-tests
scripts.vscode:bundle: npm run vscode:bundle:debugger && npm run vscode:bundle:extension
scripts.vscode:package: npm run vscode:bundle:debugger && npm run vscode:bundle:extension && lerna run vscode:package --concurrency 1 && npm run reformat
scripts.link-lsp: lerna exec yarn link @salesforce/aura-language-server @salesforce/lwc-language-server @salesforce/lightning-lsp-common --scope salesforcedx-vscode-lightning && lerna exec yarn link @salesforce/lwc-language-server @salesforce/lightning-lsp-common --scope salesforcedx-vscode-lwc
scripts.unlink-lsp: lerna exec yarn unlink @salesforce/aura-language-server @salesforce/lwc-language-server @salesforce/lightning-lsp-common --scope salesforcedx-vscode-lightning && lerna exec yarn unlink @salesforce/lwc-language-server @salesforce/lightning-lsp-common --scope salesforcedx-vscode-lwc

hooks.pre-push: npm run lint && npm run reformat
